Sensors¶

Type of returned values¶

  • boolean

    • value : ‘true’ or ‘false’

  • number

    • value : integer or float

  • string

    • value : char string

  • complex

    • value : json structure

Features¶

1Wire.Temperature¶

  • DS18B20

    name

    value

    parameter

    stat key

    Temperature

    number

    {“unit”:”°C”}

    temperature

    value

    parameter

    stat key

Service.Teleinfo¶

  • Dauguet

    name

    value

    parameter

    stat key

    Instantaneous intensity (Intensité instantanée)

    number

    {“unit”:”A”}

    iinst

    Off Peak (Heures creuses)

    number

    {“unit”:”Wh”}

    hchc

    Maximum intensity (Intensité maximale)

    number

    {“unit”:”A”}

    imax

    Tariff Period (Période tarifaire)

    string

    		  

    ptec

    Power (Puissance apparente)

    number

    {“unit”:”Va”}

    papp

    Group schedule (Groupe horaire)

    string

    		  

    hhphc

    On Peak (Heures pleines)

    number

    {“unit”:”Wh”}

    hchp

name value parameter stat key

name value parameter stat key
Ping boolean   ping

Online_Services.Weather¶

Note

Units are to be defined

Current data¶

name value parameter stat key
